languages.text: "До встречи с вами я и не думал, что готов ввязаться в нечто подобное. Могу я... коснуться вашей руки?"

traits.locale_text: "До встречи с вами я и не думал, что готов ввязаться в нечто подобное. Могу я... коснуться вашей руки?"

languages.text: "Before I met you, I had never thought that I would find myself engaged in something of this sort. Will you permit me... to touch your hand?"
languages.original_text: "До встречи с вами я и не думал, что готов ввязаться в нечто подобное. Могу я... коснуться вашей руки?"

traits.locale_text: "Before I met you, I had never thought that I would find myself engaged in something of this sort. Will you permit me... to touch your hand?"
"Before I met you, I had never thought that I would find myself engaged in something of this sort. Will you permit me... to touch your hand?"
"Before I met you, I had never thought that I would find myself engaged in something of this sort. Will you permit me... to touch your hand?"
"Before I met you, I had never thought that I would find myself engaged in something of this sort. Will you permit me... to touch your hand?"
"Before I met you, I had never thought that I would find myself engaged in something of this sort. Will you permit me... to touch your hand?"

languages.text: “在遇到你之前，我从未想过自己竟然会做这样的事。我是否有幸……能牵住你的手？”
languages.original_text: "Before I met you, I had never thought that I would find myself engaged in something of this sort. Will you permit me... to touch your hand?"

traits.locale_text: “在遇到你之前，我从未想过自己竟然会做这样的事。我是否有幸……能牵住你的手？”

languages.text: "Bevor ich Euch begegnet bin, hätte ich nie gedacht, dass ich einmal mit so etwas zu tun haben werde. Gestattet Ihr mir ... Eure Hand zu berühren?"
languages.original_text: "Before I met you, I had never thought that I would find myself engaged in something of this sort. Will you permit me... to touch your hand?"

traits.locale_text: "Bevor ich Euch begegnet bin, hätte ich nie gedacht, dass ich einmal mit so etwas zu tun haben werde. Gestattet Ihr mir ... Eure Hand zu berühren?"

languages.text: « Avant de vous rencontrer, jamais je n'aurais cru m'engager dans quelque chose de la sorte. M'autoriserez-vous à... vous toucher la main ? »
languages.original_text: "Before I met you, I had never thought that I would find myself engaged in something of this sort. Will you permit me... to touch your hand?"

traits.locale_text: « Avant de vous rencontrer, jamais je n'aurais cru m'engager dans quelque chose de la sorte. M'autoriserez-vous à... vous toucher la main ? »

languages.text: «Nunca había pensado que me vería a mí mismo en una situación así hasta que la conocí. ¿Me permitiría... tocarle la mano?».
languages.original_text: "Before I met you, I had never thought that I would find myself engaged in something of this sort. Will you permit me... to touch your hand?"

traits.locale_text: «Nunca había pensado que me vería a mí mismo en una situación así hasta que la conocí. ¿Me permitiría... tocarle la mano?».

languages.text: 「あなたに会う前の私は、自分がこういうものに関わるとは、思ったこともなかった。あなたの手に触れても…いいでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "Before I met you, I had never thought that I would find myself engaged in something of this sort. Will you permit me... to touch your hand?"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたに会う前の私は、自分がこういうものに関わるとは、思ったこともなかった。あなたの手に触れても…いいでしょうか？」

languages.text: "Seni tanımadan önce bir gün böyle şeyler yapacağım aklımın ucundan bile geçmezdi. Acaba bana... Elini lütfeder misin?"
languages.original_text: "Before I met you, I had never thought that I would find myself engaged in something of this sort. Will you permit me... to touch your hand?"
